name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: mapreduce.ifile.readahead.bytes
description: Configuration key to set the IFile readahead length in bytes.

name: fs.s3a.list.version
description:
Select which version of the S3 SDK's List Objects API to use.  Currently
    support 2 (default) and 1 (older API).

name: dfs.namenode.decommission.backoff.monitor.pending.blocks.per.lock
description:
When loading blocks into the replication queue, release the namenode write
    lock after the defined number of blocks have been processed.

name: dfs.datanode.slowpeer.low.threshold.ms
description: Threshold in milliseconds below which a DataNode is definitely not slow.

name: dfs.batched.ls.limit
description:
Limit the number of paths that can be listed in a single batched
    listing call. printed by ls. If less or equal to
    zero, at most DFS_LIST_LIMIT_DEFAULT (= 1000) will be printed.

name: dfs.client.deadnode.detection.probe.deadnode.interval.ms
description: Interval time in milliseconds for probing dead node behavior.
